description.value:
You can call forth a blasphemous word from the fiendish realms to punish your foes.

Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Divine Decree] as a 7th-level divine innate spell. You must choose evil for the spell, and you can Cast the Spell regardless of whether you have a deity or what their alignment is.
